levels.levelDescription: Welcome to the Whispering Woods, where the shadows dance among the dark grass and ancient trees whisper secrets of the past. Be wary of the deep dark holes that lurk beneath the twisted roots, for one misstep could lead you to the unknown depths below.

Traverse the treacherous Frostbite Peaks, where the snow-capped mountains glisten under the eternal sun. Beware of the icy waters that flow through these unforgiving lands, for one wrong move could plunge you into the freezing depths below.

Enter the Rusty Chain Stronghold, a fortress of ancient metal platforms held together by rusted chains. Navigate through the searing rivers of lava that threaten to engulf everything in their fiery embrace. Only the brave and cunning shall survive the trials within.
